resources.string: Sterndu is a German developer for incredible software.
Felix is a German junior developer that tries his best to learn how to code.

This app is a kind of messenger that can be used to communicate with others. \nTherefore it uses a P2P connection from the client to the host or a Bridge connection with a server in between. \nTo secure this, this app uses an AES-256 or a ChaCha20 encryption on all connections.
